User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:6.0.2) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/6.0.2
Build ID: 20110902133214

Steps to reproduce:

Drag the space between the location bar and search bar to the left to make the search bar wider.  Open a new window.


Actual results:

For a split-second, the location bar and search bar are two pixels to the right.  They then shift back two pixels to the left where they belong.


Expected results:

No noticeable change to the locations or widths of the location bar and search bar.

comments.text: This is reproducible with a new profile and doesn't occur unless the search bar has been resized.  Also notice that the location bar shows "Go to a Web Site" momentarily before the cursor focus moves to the location bar automatically and the text is cleared out.  Attached screen shots of the toolbar.
